title: Voyageurs National Park: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks         What's inside the Wolf Pack Education Trunk NPS  WOLF PACK (Grades 3 -5) Voyageurs National Park has worked with local educators to develop a wolf education trunk containing six lesson plans and support materials that are available for loan. A brief summary of the lessons can be found on the Wolf Trunk page. Trunk are aligned with the Minnesota State Academic Standards. Contact the park for more information.  Â      Ready to do some trading? NPS     VOYAGEURS CASSETTE (Grades 5-6) Local educators worked with Voyageurs National Park to develop a voyageurs education cassette (trunk). Seven lesson plans and coordinating support materials are available for loan. A brief summary of the lesson plans are available here on the Voyageur Cassette page.
